bioluminescent.Name: bioluminescent
bioluminescent.Description: to be able to produce organic light.

flourescent.Name: flourescent
flourescent.Description: possessing the property of fluorescence; exhibiting fluorescence.

luminous.Name: luminous
luminous.Description: radiating or reflecting light; shining; bright.

radiant.Name: radiant
radiant.Description: emitting rays of light; shining; bright:
